title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models via simple async/sync client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama: run prompts, chat, embeddings, model management in Node or browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLMs, chat models, or embedders inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat interface, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and CLI wrapper around Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline GitHub Copilot-style code completers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + vector DB to chat with local PDFs or notes.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Experimental multi-agent framework where each agent is an Ollama model with tools and shared memory.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for CPU and GPU (CUDA, ROCm) with one-line run commands and docker-compose samples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package: TypeScript-ready client downloaded 200k+ times/month.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: lightweight async/sync client, 150k+ monthly downloads.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers prompts using any Ollama model with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that listens for @ mentions and replies via Ollama with conversation memory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes and insert results inline or as new files.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example scaling Ollama models across GPU workers with autoscaling and batching.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing async wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embeddings, model management with strongly-typed models.
